node.title: jsonfylolcommits
node.description: A cli tool to convert all your lolcommits photos to base64 and add them to a json output file.

node.title: Tons Of Damage
node.description: Tons of Damage is a node module for the RIOT's League of Legends API.

webapps.title: League Comparer
webapps.description: Simple League of Legends web application which compares two player's status. This project uses the official League of Legends API.

webapps.title: Free Chat
webapps.description: A chat application built using AngularJS, firebase and twitter bootstrap.

games.title: Flappy Pong
games.description: Following the Flappy Bird hype, I decided to create my own version of this addictive game. So I mixed the original idea with the  classical pong game. The app is made using cocoonJS framework by Ludei which is an awesome way of converting your HTML5 canvas games into native apps for almost every mobile platform in the market.

games.title: 15 Puzzle
games.description: The 15 puzzle consists in rearrange the squares in ascending order. To play click on the square you want to move. The game is made using HTML5 canvas and javascript.

others.title: Learnyounode - Tradução PT-BR
others.description: Tradução do workshop Learnyounode da NodeSchool para português brasileiro.
